original_title: A Note of Triumph: The Golden Age of Norman Corwin
overview: On May 8th, 1945, writer, director Norman Corwin broadcast ON A NOTE OF TRIUMPH, an unforgettable homage to the end of war in Europe. This film shines a light on a lost work of genius, and examines it's haunting resonance to today's current events.
title: A Note of Triumph: The Golden Age of Norman Corwin
